TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grid extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法和屬性來管理 物件的主要和次要格線。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage the major and minor grids of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會在圖表上，方格中提供的功能，並使用公開並每個屬性物件。This class provides the functionality for the grids on the chart, and is exposed using the and properties of each object. 根據預設，主要格線不需要他們， ， ，和屬性集。Major grid lines by default do not have their , , , and properties set. 當未設定這些屬性主要格線時，控制項會自動決定格線適當的值。When these properties for major grid lines are not set, the control determines the appropriate values for grid lines automatically. 軸和其次要格線，預設有他們， ， ，以及屬性設定為**自動**(0)。The axis and its minor grid lines by default have their , , , and properties set to **Auto** (0). 如果已啟用軸標籤或次要格線，而不會修改這些屬性，控制項自動決定頻率繪製的次要格線。If axis labels or minor grid lines are enabled and these properties are not modified, the control automatically determines how often to draw the minor grid lines. 軸的格線：Axis grids: - 可以啟用或停用。Can be enabled or disabled. - 已決定，他們會先繪製的起點。Have a starting point that determines where they are first drawn. - 可以為樣式、 寬度和色彩的顯示行會。Display lines that can be set for style, width and color. - 可以有自動間隔或手動設定的間隔。Can have either automatic intervals, or intervals that are set manually.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標決定是否啟用主要或次要格線。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether major or minor grid lines are enabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用則為 ，如果已停用則為 。

span.span: if enabled, if disabled.

value.span: 主要格線物件預設為 ，而次要格線物件則預設為 。

span.span: The default is for major grid objects and for minor grid objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要和次要格線會顯示啟用時，並停用時，不可見。Major and minor grids are visible when enabled, and not visible when disabled. 如果停用，不會顯示刻度標記。Tick marks will not be displayed if disabled. 您可以設定連線，停用刻度屬性設。You can disable tick marks by setting the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Interval { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Interval : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定主要或次要格線之間的間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 值，表示格線之間的間隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between grid lines.

value.span: 根據預設，主要格線不會設定此值 ()。

span.span: By default, the value is not set () for major grid lines.

value.span: 如果是次要格線，預設值為零 (0)。

span.span: For minor grid lines, the default value is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設此屬性未設定軸標籤、 主要刻度和主要格線。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未設定 — 根據預設，明確地使用其中一個在設計階段，或藉由指定的值在執行階段 — 實際的值，這個屬性由屬性物件圖表所屬的項目，例如格線列或刻度標記。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using at design time, or by assigning a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object to which the chart element, such as a grid line or tick mark, belongs. 次要刻度標記和格線的間隔永遠不會受到屬性值。The interval of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 間隔以單位來計算軸，並決定適用的圖表項目繪製的頻率。The interval is measured in axis units, and determines how often an applicable chart element is drawn. 例如，假設 直條圖具有 1 的 X 軸步驟 （也就是 1、 2、 3、 4 和等等）;如果您將設定屬性設為 2 X 軸，座標軸標籤將會顯示每個其他資料行。For example, suppose a column chart has an X axis step of 1 (that is, 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth); if you set the property for the X axis to 2, an axis label will be displayed for every other column. 同樣適用於所有適用的圖表項目。The same holds true for all applicable chart elements. 換句話說，如果先前的範例區域中已使用幾行，與為 0.5，及其屬性為 2、 帶狀線會顯示在 0.5、 2.5、 4.5 和等等。In other words, if in the previous example strip lines were being used, with an of 0.5, and their property was 2, a strip line would be displayed at 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, and so on. 如果您設定的圖表項目`Interval`屬性設為零，間隔將會自動決定控制項。If you set a chart element `Interval` property to zero, an interval will be automatically determined by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定格線的位移。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines.

value.span: 表示間隔位移的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設此屬性未設定軸標籤、 主要刻度和主要格線。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未設定 — 預設、 藉由明確指定 「 未設定 」 在設計階段，或將它指派的值在執行階段，實際的值，這個屬性由屬性物件圖表項目，例如格線或刻度標記，屬於。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set"at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element, such as a grid line or a tick mark, belongs to. 值永遠不會影響上次要刻度和格線的間隔位移屬性物件。The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property of the object. 屬性設定會定義之位移的測量單位。The property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset. 可以是負數的值。The can be a negative value.

summary.span: 取得或設定主要和次要格線的間隔位移類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of major and minor grid lines.

value.span: 表示間隔類型的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 根據預設，主要格線不會設定此值。

span.span: By default it is not set for major grid lines.

value.span: 如果是次要格線，預設值為 。

span.span: The default value for minor grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設此屬性未設定軸標籤、 主要刻度和主要格線。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未設定 — 預設、 藉由明確指定 「 未設定 」 在設計階段，或將它指派的值在執行階段，實際的值，這個屬性由屬性物件圖表項目 — 格線或刻度標記，例如，屬於。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to. 次要刻度和格線的間隔位移的類型永遠不會受到屬性值。The interval offset type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 如果此間隔位移類型會設定為，則將使用的屬性。If this interval offset type is set to , the property will be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定主要或次要格線的間隔類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 表示間隔類型的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 根據預設，座標軸標籤、主要刻度標記和主要格線不會設定此值 (透過使用 列舉值)。

span.span: By default it is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines, by using the enumeration value.

value.span: 如果是次要刻度標記和格線，預設值為 。

span.span: The default value for minor tick marks and grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設此屬性未設定軸標籤、 主要刻度和主要格線。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未設定 — 預設、 明確地使用 「 未設定 」 在設計階段，或將它指派的值在執行階段，實際的值，這個屬性由屬性物件的圖表項目— 格線或刻度標記，例如，屬於。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time— the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to. 次要刻度標記和格線的間隔類型永遠不會受到值屬性。The interval type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property. 間隔類型，可以設定為; 間隔的類型則是用來定的 X 值或 Y 值繪製的根據哪個座標軸適用的項目所屬的物件。Interval types can be set to ; the type of interval then depends on either the X-values or Y-values of the plotted objects, depending on which axis the applicable elements belong to. 設定如果資料點的值，在值軸屬性只會有影響或`double`值。Setting the property for a value axis will only have an effect if the values of the data points are or `double` values. 此外，或是繪製的屬性必須設為或。Also, the or property of the plotted must be set to or . 設定類別目錄軸屬性只會有影響，如果屬性 (或屬性，視有問題的軸) 的繪製物件是或.Setting the property for a categorical axis will only have an effect if the property (or property, depending on the axis in question) of the plotted object is either or . > [!NOTE] > 星期日，就會被視為一週的第一天。Sunday is considered the first day of the week.

A object.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來指定主要和次要刻度標記或格線的色彩。The property is used to specify the color of major and minor tick marks or grids.

summary.span: 取得或設定主要和次要格線的線條寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of major and minor grid lines.

value.span: ，表示單位為像素的線條寬度。

span.span: An that represents the line width in pixels.
The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來指定線條的寬度，單位為像素的主要和次要刻度標記或格線。The property can be used to specify the line width, in pixels, of major and minor tick marks or grids.
